Title: Relates to creating the family essential program
Summary: Creates the family essential program within the office for the aging to provide for advocacy, collaborative and education infrastructure for essential family caregivers within nursing homes and other long term care communities.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 2 ยง230, Eld L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to implementing the family essential program to create an advocacy, collaborative and an education infrastructure for essential family caregivers within nursing homes and other long term care communities
